cause.description:
We would like to give everyone the chance to help unite man/womankind, by offering hugs free of charge to any willing participant, anywhere, anytime, any day. how can you help? pick a day and go out with signs that say free hugs, and walk around giving them for a few hours, even if you do just one day a year. help unite mankind in peace. help to make some ones day. no donations required, but all donations will go to help fight breast cancer.
1. Peace on earth
2. To stop war
3. Help each other out
cause.name: Free Hugs.
